mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Fratson Petition."; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 30; "Fratson Petition."; A reprieve was sought for George Fratson, who was sentenced to death for murder of George Armstrong, an elderly shop owner. Thumbprint evidence was used and claimed to be the case-winner, however, if the print was truly Fratson's was suspect.; Daily Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Evidence, Criminal
